name: UtilitiesInSwift
description:
Utility functions for swift that have been created through the years.  Some converted from other languages.  
* The utilities are broken down by type categories (I did what I thought was ok).
* UtilityCues --> I mainly created these so as Swift morphs, I can easily adjust the function bodies and not all over the code base,
                  plus, I may want to add later functionality.
